I can help you with that.

Since I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to send you a direct reminder on your phone. However, I can guide you through the process of setting up a reminder on your device.

Here's what you can do:

**For Android devices:**

1. Open the Google Keep app (or any other note-taking app you prefer).
2. Create a new note and title it "Fix Black Boots' Buckle".
3. Set a reminder for 1 week from today by tapping the "Remind me" button and selecting the desired date and time.
4. Choose your preferred notification settings, such as the time of day and notification type.

**For iOS devices:**

1. Open the Notes app (or any other note-taking app you prefer).
2. Create a new note and title it "Fix Black Boots' Buckle".
3. Tap the "Share" icon and select "Reminders".
4. Set a reminder for 1 week from today by tapping the "+" icon and selecting the desired date and time.
5. Choose your preferred notification settings, such as the time of day and notification type.

**Alternative method:**

If you prefer, you can also use a digital calendar like Google Calendar or Apple Calendar to set a reminder. Simply create a new event, title it "Fix Black Boots' Buckle", and set the reminder for 1 week from today.

That's it! You should now have a digital reminder set to remind you to fix your black boots' buckle in a week.
